gui.container_RMB: Right click to swap or move it to the first avalible Curio slot.
gui.container_SRMB: Shift and right click to swap or move it to the second avalible Curio slot.
config.forbidden_items.tooltip:
Blacklisted Items. 
Add the name of the item to blacklist, modid:item_name format, separated by comma. 
Example: "curios:amulet", "curios:ring".
